document_data.name: Beaker
document_data.mainbody: '''Beakers''' were glass containers that were used to manipulate liquids and powders. They were typically used in laboratories or by itinerant [[alchemist]]s to conduct experiments.
document_data.Description: Though generally made of [[glass]], some beakers were made of crystal, [[ceramic]], or even lightly hammered metal. They were used to heat liquids, combine solutions, and dissolve watery compounds.
document_data.Availability: ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold beakers in a variety of different sizes, along with [[vial]]s and other laboratory glass containers, all of which were produced by the [[glass-blowers guild]] of [[Urmlaspyr]].
document_data.Notable Users of Beakers:
* Beakers of several different sizes were essential in [[wizard]]s' laboratories. 
* Beakers were an integral components of [[alchemist's supplies]].
